https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hIwFkTKpcn9KmQrsnHNEl6yX4M9.jpg A samurai from the Edo Period time travels to present day Japan where he meets a divorcee and her son. Soon, he discovers a passion for making pastries. A Boy and His Samurai
